master:
1. Clear all ｢Master Missions｣ for this week

2.Defeat 30 Enemies. (Excluding Bosses or Servants)

3.Defeat 15 Magical/Mystical Enemies.

4.Obtain 3 Gems of any rarity for Saber, Caster or Berserker from quests.

5.	Obtain 3 Gems of any rarity for Archericon or Assassinicon from quests.

6.Obtain 3 Gems of any rarity for Lancericon or Ridericon from quests.

7.Clear 10 quests.
